Which type of failure occurs in a short column?
The spacing between two helical reinforcements of a circular column is called the
A column subjected to both axial load and bending moment in one plane is called:
The recommended effective length L of a cantilever column shall be:
A reinforced concrete column is classified as short when:

answers.a: Its slenderness ratio exceeds 12 in both directions
answers.b: Its slenderness ratio is less than 12 in both directions
answers.c: Its height is less than 3 times its least lateral dimension
answers.d: Its depth is less than 3 times its width
